1485370.name: Futuclass Education
1485370.description:
** 10 Chemistry and 1 Physics VR Modules – Available for $7.99 Each! **

Discover the most engaging way to learn Chemistry and Physics with immersive, gamified Virtual Reality experiences.

★ Hold molecules in your hand in Reaction Balancing

★ Shoot particles to create atoms in Atom Structure

★ Work the salts assembly line to learn the nomenclature of Salts

★ Solve the Chemistry puzzle in Oxygen Escape Room

★ Experiment with the properties of gases and metals to learn about Hydrogen and Oxygen

And so much more!

Proven Learning Value

Co-created with award-winning science teachers, Futuclass VR modules have been tested in real classrooms and at home. Students explore, make mistakes, receive instant feedback, and progress at their own pace—keeping even the most restless learners engaged.

What’s Included?

- 10 Chemistry modules – Atomic Structure, Chemical Bonds, Reaction Balancing, Hydrogen & Oxygen, Oxygen Escape Room, Acids, Bases & Salts, Salts, Moles & Molarity 1-2, Redox Reactions

- 1 Physics modules – Nuclear Reactions

- Lesson Plans

- Futuclass Teacher Portal – Access best practices and monitor student progress in real time via web browser

* For ages 13 and up

** Also available via Steam PC Café
